attributes.action: Post Nominal Letters for armed service personnel who have served in conflict tours of duty.
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to request a discussion in the houses of parliament regarding post-nominal letters for Armed Forces personnel who have served in a conflict tours of duty.

An example would be personnel who have served on OP Telic and OP Herrick who have qualified for a clasp.

Giving qualifying service personnel post nominal letters will show recognition for the service and dedication given to their Queen and Country.
